description.value:
Activate 1 (manipulate)

Access Tian Xia origin

Though these preserved vegetables aren't actual moonflowers, they're made using a moonflower-distilled vinegar. When consumed, tendrils sprout from your veins and curl around you, granting you a +2 status bonus to saves against void effects for 10 minutes and reducing your wounded condition by up to 2.

Eating more than one preserved moonflower dish in a day doesn't grant further benefits and makes you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Drained]{Drained 1}.

publication.title: Pathfinder Lost Omens: Tian Xia Character Guide
